summary: Provides a collection of helper routines used throughout the Sentence‑Transformers library, handling tensor conversion, device placement, similarity calculations, embedding post‑processing, data loading, progress‑bar control and environment checks.
business_intent: Enable developers to efficiently work with sentence‑embedding models by offering ready‑made utilities for common operations such as similarity scoring, embedding normalization, hard‑negative mining, and seamless integration with the Hugging Face hub.
